name: Fruity Krispy Treats
author: Megan Clisby
summary: Crispy cereal treats with a fruity twist.
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) package fruit flavored mini marshmallows
6 cups fruit-flavored breakfast cereal (such as Post Fruity Pebbles®)
directions: Spray an 8x10-inch pan with cooking spray
In a large saucepan over low heat, melt the butter
Gently stir the marshmallows into the butter, and allow to fully melt
Stir until the butter and marshmallows are blended, remove pan from heat, and stir in the breakfast cereal until the cereal is completely coated with the melted marshmallows
Spread the mixture out into the prepared pan, refrigerate for 1 hour to set, and cut into bars
